main event: A spherical shaped object pulsating white with no red or green lights was sighted by two observers, the Officer of the Deck (OOD) and a lookout, on the USS Savage in the Atlantic Ocean.
interesting points: The object was at a medium altitude and moving at a very fast speed in an easterly direction.
The seas were moderate with 3/10 cloud coverage and an 8 knot wind.
The sighting was reported through an Incoming message with the Air Force Incident number 54489 (108-653).
The object's height was recorded as 54,189 feet (16,386 meters).
The location of the sighting was at 49째22' N 17째42' W in the Atlantic Ocean.
sighted object: spherical shaped object pulsating white with no red or green lights
witnesses: Officer of the Deck (OOD) and a lookout on the USS Savage
